extendedInfo.description: Touch the screen and receive an electric shock! In the manner of plasma balls, touch screen creates effects and fascinating flashes between the tip of your finger and contour of your phone, which starts to vibrate. You can change the color of lightning. It's fun, it's useless: it is therefore essential!

reviews.title: Do Not Update!
reviews.comment: Enjoyed the old version, but didn\'t think to archive before updating (installing new). Now it doesn\'t work, at all. Won\'t even open! Uninstalling!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wish I didn\'t update.
reviews.comment: Just liked the simple spark, don\'t fill up my phone memory with that other shite.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Oops... new version wont work on my phone :( .... uninstalling! What did you do! WAS a fun app when it worked!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really awfull
reviews.comment: I have never rated an app before but I have to warn others not to bother getting this everytime I try to open this it wont open at all and has crashed a previous phone
reviews.author: Jonina Pepperell

reviews.comment: Well im sure this new update would be cool however when i tap on it nothing happens. It wont load even from the launcher.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is it my phone!?
reviews.comment: I have the HTC one and it won\'t open I used to have this app on my old phone and it worked great now it doesn\'t
reviews.author: Tony guzman

reviews.title: Do not update!
reviews.comment: Used to be quick and simple. Now it\'s just a bloated piece of crap that doesn\'t work properly and runs very slow.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: The kids and I really enjoy this app! Please try to make one that looks like water going up and down. Would be awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Update is good but now it don\'t let me use it says: application is not installed on phone. Android Samsung captivate
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I never should have updated. This went from a cool easy to open gag app to a bloated pile of crap. I\'m restoring from backup and never updating again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hate the new downgrade
reviews.comment: Was really nice - simple and fast. Now very very slow to open, menu button doesn\'t work, and the effect is spoiled by having icons permanently visible in bottom right of screen. Old version was 5, new version is a 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Remove ads doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Paid to have ads removed, however they\'re still there at the top. Please fix this. Apart from that, great.
reviews.author: Theo Kesby

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: What\'s with all the bitching?? I\'ve had this since the Droid 1 and this is one of the most drastic and amazing updates I\'ve ever seen. I was also impressed by the fact that the dev kept the original spark. To all who complain about it not running properly I, as a Verizon sales rep, highly recommend upgrading to a device that can handle this simple app. I\'m running the razr and have no problems. As a matter of fact the update fixed the screen rez.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is so beast it would b cool if there was one that had a plasma ball in the middle and when you touch it with 2 fingers going different directions lighting rods will come out changing colors...................
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What happened
reviews.comment: New update ruined app. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool update
reviews.comment: Lots of new features & doesn\'t go slow on my phone like other\'s have reported. Entertaining for a bit, especially for young ones!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Its not even running on my mobile . Rly annoyed . Tried reinstalling it . But didnt help
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: I installed it on my phone, Thinking it would be amasing, but, I couldn\'t even get it running!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Looks cool on my phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine for me
reviews.comment: I like the new sparks, responsive for me, galaxy note.
reviews.author: A Google User
